getContent.handler: let url = `https://${source}/${storySlug}/chuong-${chapter}/`; let response = await fetch(url); const htmlData = await response.text(); const dom = new JSDOM(htmlData); const document = dom.window.document; let rawContent = document.getElementById('chapter-c').getElementsByTagName('p'); let content = ''; for (let i = 0; i < rawContent.length; i += 2) { content += rawContent[i].textContent + '\n'; } return content;
